bug.author: cmburgul
bug.description:
UnityEnvironmentException: The API number is not compatible between Unity and python. Python API : API-9, Unity API : API-4. Please go to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents>https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents</denchmark-link> to download the latest version of ML-Agents. I don't find any update for API-4. Environment :
OS + version: Linux 16.04 ML-Agents version: Unity 2017.4
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20013792/64024203-d5948200-cb07-11e9-9d04-c45350724a13.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This error arrises because your Python ml-agents and your Unity ml-agents do not have the same version. To upgrade python, you need to run where X.Y.Z is the version you want. To upgrade the unity code version, you must reclone and update all the files of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/tree/master/UnitySDK/Assets/ML-Agents>this folder</denchmark-link> in you project. Closing this issue as it is a duplicate of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/issues/1883>#1883</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/issues/2444>#2444</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/issues/2182>#2182</denchmark-link>
